message: Mine, by far, is the Beatles.
Favorite band from the 60's: the Beatles, the Beach Boys or the Rolling Stones?
Can I go with option D - Other? My favorite band from the 60's is by far Pink Floyd. Their early psychedelic rock from the 60's is amazing. Should check out "The Piper at the Gates of Dawn" album
Hrm. I'd have to say Beach Boys.
But between those three I would have to go with the Beatles as well
Not a huge fan of them all, but.. I think Beach Boys make me happier than the Beatles.
Stones. Am I the only one really? Wow.

of the three, Beatles! but no discredit to Beach Boys. Floyd too, but the problem is I've heard all the songs SOOOO many times that I get the "turn off the repeat" feeling every time I hear them. That said, Sargent Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band is the single best recording for a sound check, amps, eq, speakers, if you can play the whole album without an adjustment, you're set. :)
